T = int(input())
for tc in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    a_arr = input()
    b_arr = input()
    score = 0
    baseline = ord('a') - 1
    for i in range(n):
        a_code = ord(a_arr[i]) - baseline
        b_code = ord(b_arr[i]) - baseline
        score += a_code - b_code + 26
    score = score % 26
    score = min(score, 26 - score)
    print(score)

        cost1 += score

            score = cost1
        else:

    print(abs(score))

from string import ascii_lowercase
from sys import stdin
alphabet = ascii_lowercase
for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    n = int(stdin.readline().strip())
    a = stdin.readline().strip()
    b = stdin.readline().strip()
    a_scores = []
    b_scores = []
    for i in range(n):
        score = alphabet.index(a[i]) - alphabet.index(b[i])
        if score > 0:
            score -= 26
        score = abs(score)
        a_scores.append(score)
        b_scores.append(abs(26 - score) * -1)
    abs_score = 0
    for x in range(n):
        if abs(abs_score + b_scores[x]) < abs(abs_score + a_scores[x]):
            abs_score += b_scores[x]
        else:
            abs_score += a_scores[x]
    print(abs(abs_score))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    arr = []
    for i in range(0, n):
        x = (ord(a[i]) - ord(b[i]) + 26) % 26
        arr.append(x)
    s = sum(arr) % 26
    ans = min(s, 26 - s)
    print(ans)

import numpy as np

def cycle(a, b):
    Alphabet = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
    pos_a = Alphabet.find(a)
    pos_b = Alphabet.find(b)
    if pos_a <= pos_b:
        return pos_b - pos_a
    else:
        return 26 - (pos_a - pos_b)
T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    A = str(input())
    B = str(input())
    Score = 0
    for i in range(N):
        cy = cycle(A[i], B[i])
        Score += cy
    s1 = Score % 26
    s2 = 26 - s1
    print(min(s1, s2))

z = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    A = input().lower()
    B = input().lower()
    score = 0
    for (i, j) in zip(A, B):
        ii = z.index(i)
        jj = z.index(j)
        x = z[ii:].index(j)
        y = z[jj:].index(i)
        if abs(score + x) < abs(score - y):
            score = score + x
        else:
            score = score - y
    print(abs(score))

import string
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    a = str(input())
    b = str(input())
    ans = 0
    for i in range(0, n):
        if string.ascii_lowercase.index(a[i]) > string.ascii_lowercase.index(b[i]):
            j = 26 - (string.ascii_lowercase.index(a[i]) - string.ascii_lowercase.index(b[i]))
            ans += j
        else:
            k = string.ascii_lowercase.index(b[i]) - string.ascii_lowercase.index(a[i])
            ans += k
    print(min(abs(ans % 26 - 26), ans % 26))
    t -= 1

    n = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    c = d = 0
    e = f = 0
    for (i, j) in zip(s1, s2):
        c = ord(i) - ord(j)
        d = ord(j) - ord(i)
        if c < 0:
            c += 26
        if d < 0:
            d += 26
        val1 = e + c
        val2 = e - d
        if abs(val1) <= abs(val2):
            f = abs(val1)
            e = val1
        else:
            f = abs(val2)
            e = val2
    print(f)

test = int(input())
while test:
    n = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    curr_score = 0
    curr_value = 0
    for (i, j) in zip(s1, s2):
        a_b = ord(j) - ord(i)
        b_a = ord(i) - ord(j)
        if a_b < 0:
            a_b += 26
        if b_a < 0:
            b_a += 26
        val1 = curr_value + a_b
        val2 = curr_value - b_a
        if abs(val1) <= abs(val2):
            curr_score = abs(val1)
            curr_value = val1
        else:
            curr_score = abs(val2)
            curr_value = val2
    print(curr_score)
    test -= 1
